hero.title: Transform Your Surplus Inventory Into Profit
hero.description: The premier B2B marketplace for CBD, vapes, and alternative health products. Connect with verified traders, liquidate expiring stock, and maximize your wholesale revenue.

problem.title: Stop Losing Money on Expiring Inventory
problem.subtitle: Millions of dollars in CBD, vape, and wellness products are discarded annually due to approaching expiry dates. We're changing that in 4 steps.
problems: Products approaching expiry dates become unsellable
Limited channels to liquidate surplus inventory
Millions lost to discarded out-of-date stock
solutions: Network of verified CBD/vape retailers and distributors
One-click integration with existing inventory systems
Recover 60-80% of value from expiring stock

testimonial.quote: We were facing $50K in losses from CBD products approaching expiry. Within 2 weeks on Wellness Marketplace, we liquidated 80% of our surplus inventory at 70% of original value. Game changer.

companies.partnership_description: This joint venture combines Uptivity's cutting-edge technology and automation capabilities with Wellness-stores' deep industry knowledge and established relationships. Together, we're creating the most comprehensive B2B marketplace for the wellness industry, designed to solve real problems and drive measurable results for our partners.
